questions.question: This arc revolves around Luffy and his crew's involvement in a massive conflict against Kaido and his forces. What is...?
In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates help a princess save her kingdom from a Warlord of the Sea who uses sand-based powers. What is...?
This arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' encounter with a group of powerful fish-men and a former Warlord of the Sea. What is...?
This technique, used by a member of the Worst Generation, allows the user to create and manipulate poison. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows the user to turn their body parts into weapons. What is...?
This technique, used by a certain pirate captain, involves creating a giant spectral elephant. What is...?
questions.answer: Zou Zou no Mi, Model: Mammoth

questions.question: This revolutionary is known for his crow zone ability and efforts to overthrow the World Government. Who is...?
This former member of the Royal Shichibukai is known for their Snake-Snake Fruit powers and role as the queen of Amazon Lily. Who is...?
This chief of staff of the Revolutionary Army is known for his flame powers and is a sworn brother to the Straw Hat Pirates' captain. Who is...?
